DOC.brief_summary: The COMPLETE registry prospective , longitudinal , multinational , observational study collect data patient peripheral T-cell lymphoma ( PTCL ) treat academic community practice . The registry enroll newly-diagnosed patient PTCL treat variety regimen . The COMPLETE registry design good understand PTCL patient characteristic , treatment , outcome help design understand future clinical trial .
DOC.brief_title: Comprehensive Oncology Measures Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma Treatment Registry
DOC.criteria: Patient newly diagnose Peripheral Tcell Lymphoma ( PTCL ) : Aggressive natural killer ( NK ) cell leukemia Adult Tcell lymphoma/leukemia ( human Tcell leukemia virus [ HTLV ] 1+ ) Angioimmunoblastic Tcell lymphoma Anaplastic large cell lymphoma ( ALCL ) , primary systemic type ( ALK+ , ALK ) PTCL , otherwise specify ( NOS ) T/NKcell lymphoma , nasal type Enteropathytype intestinal lymphoma Hepatosplenic Tcell lymphoma Subcutaneous panniculitis Tcell lymphoma Transformed mycosis fungoides ( diagnosis transformation ) Tcell prolymphocytic leukemia ( TPLL ) Cutaneous gamma/delta ( γ/δ ) Tcell lymphoma Cutaneous aggressive CD8+ Tcell lymphoma Hematodermic neoplasm ( blastic plasmacytoid dendritic cell neoplasm ) Systemic Epstein Barr Virus ( EBV ) + Tcell lymphoma ( Tcell lymphoproliferative disorder childhood ) Other TCell lymphoma list Exclusion Criteria Patient give write informed consent Patient T NKcell malignancy include : Precursor T/NK neoplasms Tcell large granular lymphocytic leukemia Mycosis fungoides , transform mycosis fungoides Sézary syndrome Primary cutaneous CD30+ disorder : ALCL lymphomatoid papulosis
